SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DEBH.DEBH_NO, DEBH.DEBH_HADR_NAME1,DEBH.DEBH_HADR_ADDRESS,DEBH.DEBH_HADR_CITY,DEBH.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY FROM :1/DEBH AS DEBH JOIN :1/DEBC AS DEBC ON DEBC.DEBC_DEBH=DEBH.DEBH_NO WHERE DEBH.DEBH_ISBUYINGGROUP='Y' AND DEBH.DEBH_DATDELETED IS NULL AND DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO=:2 and DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO=:3 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
